name: In Between (itch) (ResRebus)
description:
Little experimental game made for Mini-Jam 80: Cats. The added limitation was that all textures had to be 8x8 pixels. This is mostly an experimental game, made to test the world switching mechanic, where you play as an inter-dimensional cat. Reach the fallen star at the end.

Controls:

  • wasd - move
  • shift - flip worlds/ dash (places a portal between worlds)
  • space - jump

Blue bullets are in the flipped world, while red ones are in the real world, you can only get hit if you are in the same world as the bullet.

Bullets and enemies can travel through the portals you place.

Tiled objects only exist in one world, and can be passed in the other.
